template<class Mesh>
class OpenMesh::Smoother::SmootherT< Mesh >

Base class for smoothing algorithms.

enum OpenMesh::Smoother::SmootherT::Component

Enumerator:
Tangential  Smooth tangential direction.
Normal  Smooth normal direction.
